text: Dāng yǒurén duì tāmen [yóutài jiàotú] shuō “nǐmen dāng xìnyǎng ān lā suǒ jiàng shì de jīngdiǎn [“gǔlánjīng”]” shí, tāmen biàn shuō:“Wǒmen zhǐ xìnyǎng jiàng shì wǒmen de jīngdiǎn.” Tāmen bù xìnyǎng cǐhòu jiàng shì de jīngdiǎn [“gǔlánjīng”], jǐnguǎn tā [“gǔlánjīng”] shì zhēnlǐ, kěyǐ zhèngshí tāmen yǐ yǒu de jīngdiǎn. Nǐ [duì tāmen] shuō:“Nǐmen yǐqián wéi shén me yào wàngtú shāhài ān lā de xiānzhīmen ne? Jiǎrú nǐmen shì xìnshì.”
